/** getLineTotalList ... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 리스트 목록 */ select lb.line_manage_id, /* 선번장 케이블 관리번호 */ lb.qr_image_location, /* 선번장 이미지 */ /* 출발지 */ seb.asset_id s_asset_id, /* 자산분류 */ sec.asset_category s_asset_category , /* 출발지 자산 카테고리 */ sed.installation_coordinates s_installation_coordinates, /* 설치좌표 */ seb.eqp_manage_id s_eqp_manage_id, /* 관리 id */ seb.eqp_name s_eqp_name , /* 구성자원명 */ seb.model_name s_model_name, /* 모델명 */ seb.host_name s_host_name, /* 호스트명 */ seb.m_company s_m_company, /* 제조사 */ lb.start_eqp_port s_port, /* 포트번호 */ seb.primary_operator s_primary_operator, /* 운영담당자 */ seb.primary_outsourced_operator s_primary_outsourced_operator, /* 위탁운영담당자 */ /* 목적지 */ eeb.asset_id e_asset_id, /* 자산분류 */ eec.asset_category e_asset_category, /* 목적지 자산 카테고리 */ eed.installation_coordinates e_installation_coordinates, /* 설치좌표 */ eeb.eqp_manage_id e_eqp_manage_id, /* 관리 id */ eeb.eqp_name e_eqp_name , /* 구성자원명 */ eeb.model_name e_model_name, /* 모델명 */ eeb.host_name e_host_name, /* 호스트명 */ eeb.m_company e_m_company, /* 제조사 */ lb.end_eqp_port e_port, /* 포트번호 */ eeb.primary_operator e_primary_operator, /* 운영담당자 */ eeb.primary_outsourced_operator e_primary_outsourced_operator, /* 위탁운영담당자 */ /* 선번장 회선 */ lctg.category line_category, /* 회선구분 */ lspd.speed line_speed, /* 회선속도 */ lspd.color line_color /* 회선색상 */ from line_basic lb /* 선번장 정보 */ join equipment_basic seb /* 출발지 기본정보 */ on lb.start_eqp_id = seb.eqp_manage_id join equipment_detail sed /* 출발지 상세정보 */ on seb.eqp_manage_id = sed.eqp_manage_id join ( select asset_id , asset_category from equipment_categories group by asset_id , asset_category ) sec /* 출발지 연결정보 */ on seb.asset_id = sec.asset_id join equipment_basic eeb /* 목적지 기본정보 */ on lb.end_eqp_id = eeb.eqp_manage_id join equipment_detail eed /* 목적지 상세정보 */ on eeb.eqp_manage_id = eed.eqp_manage_id join ( select asset_id , asset_category from equipment_categories group by asset_id , asset_category ) eec /* 목적지 연결정보 */ on eeb.asset_id = eec.asset_id join line_category lctg /* 회선구분 */ on lb.line_category = lctg.idx join line_speed lspd /* 회선속도 */ on lb.line_speed = lspd.idx where 1=1
ORDER BY lb.line_manage_id desc

/** getLineTotalListCnt ... 선번장관리 > 선번장 목록 > 리스트 개수 */ select count(lb.line_manage_id) from line_basic lb /* 선번장 정보 */ join equipment_basic seb /* 출발지 기본정보 */ on lb.start_eqp_id = seb.eqp_manage_id join equipment_detail sed /* 출발지 상세정보 */ on seb.eqp_manage_id = sed.eqp_manage_id join ( select asset_id , asset_category from equipment_categories group by asset_id , asset_category ) sec /* 출발지 연결정보 */ on seb.asset_id = sec.asset_id join equipment_basic eeb /* 목적지 기본정보 */ on lb.end_eqp_id = eeb.eqp_manage_id join equipment_detail eed /* 목적지 상세정보 */ on eeb.eqp_manage_id = eed.eqp_manage_id join ( select asset_id , asset_category from equipment_categories group by asset_id , asset_category ) eec /* 목적지 연결정보 */ on eeb.asset_id = eec.asset_id join line_category lctg /* 회선구분 */ on lb.line_category = lctg.idx join line_speed lspd /* 회선속도 */ on lb.line_speed = lspd.idx where 1=1

/** getLineStartEquipmentList ... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 추가 페이지 > 출발지 리스트 */ select eb.eqp_manage_id , /* 관리번호 */ eb.eqp_name , /* 구성자원명 */ eb.model_name , /* 모델명 */ eb.host_name , /* 호스트명 */ eb.m_company , /* 제조사 */ eb.primary_operator , /* 운영담당자 */ eb.primary_outsourced_operator , /* 위탁운영담당자 */ ec.config_category , /* 구성분류 */ ec.asset_category , /* 자산분류 */ ec.sub_category , /* 자산세부분류 */ ec.detail_category , /* 자산상세분류 */ ed.installation_coordinates /* 설치좌표 */ from equipment_basic eb join equipment_detail ed on eb.eqp_manage_id = ed.eqp_manage_id join equipment_categories ec on eb.config_id = ec.config_id and eb.asset_id = ec.asset_id and eb.sub_id = ec.sub_id and eb.detail_id = ec.detail_id where 1=1 and eb.is_deleted = 'N' and ec.categories in ('SV', 'NW', 'SE') and eb.eqp_manage_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT eqp_manage_id FROM equipment_regist_hw) ORDER BY eb.eqp_manage_id desc LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

/** getLineStartEquipmentListCnt ... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 추가 페이지 > 출발지 리스트 개수 */ select count(eb.eqp_manage_id) from equipment_basic eb join equipment_detail ed on eb.eqp_manage_id = ed.eqp_manage_id join equipment_categories ec on eb.config_id = ec.config_id and eb.asset_id = ec.asset_id and eb.sub_id = ec.sub_id and eb.detail_id = ec.detail_id where 1=1 and eb.is_deleted = 'N' and ec.categories in ('SV', 'NW', 'SE') and eb.eqp_manage_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT eqp_manage_id FROM equipment_regist_hw)

/** getLineEndEquipmentList ... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 추가 페이지 > 목적지 리스트 */ select eb.eqp_manage_id , /* 관리번호 */ eb.eqp_name , /* 구성자원명 */ eb.model_name , /* 모델명 */ eb.host_name , /* 호스트명 */ eb.m_company , /* 제조사 */ eb.primary_operator , /* 운영담당자 */ eb.primary_outsourced_operator , /* 위탁운영담당자 */ ec.config_category , /* 구성분류 */ ec.asset_category , /* 자산분류 */ ec.sub_category , /* 자산세부분류 */ ec.detail_category , /* 자산상세분류 */ ed.installation_coordinates, /* 설치좌표 */ erh.eqp_link_manage_id , /* 연결정보장비 관리번호 */ erh.eqp_port , /* 장비포트번호 */ erh.eqp_link_port /* 연결정보장비 포트번호 */ from equipment_regist_hw erh join equipment_basic eb on erh.eqp_link_manage_id = eb.eqp_manage_id join equipment_detail ed on eb.eqp_manage_id = ed.eqp_manage_id join equipment_categories ec on eb.config_id = ec.config_id and eb.asset_id = ec.asset_id and eb.sub_id = ec.sub_id and eb.detail_id = ec.detail_id where erh.eqp_manage_id = #{eqp_manage_id} LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

/** getLineEndEquipmentListCnt ... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 추가 페이지 > 목적지 리스트 개수 */ select count(eb.eqp_manage_id) from equipment_regist_hw erh join equipment_basic eb on erh.eqp_link_manage_id = eb.eqp_manage_id join equipment_detail ed on eb.eqp_manage_id = ed.eqp_manage_id join equipment_categories ec on eb.config_id = ec.config_id and eb.asset_id = ec.asset_id and eb.sub_id = ec.sub_id and eb.detail_id = ec.detail_id where erh.eqp_manage_id = #{eqp_manage_id}

/* checkInsertListToContainLine... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 추가 페이지 > 저장 > 선번장 목록 저장하기 전 이미 존재하는지 검증 */ select count(line_manage_id) from line_basic where 1=1 and is_deleted = 'N' and (start_eqp_id = #{rackStartId} and start_eqp_port = #{lineStartPort}) and (end_eqp_id = #{rackEndId} and end_eqp_port = #{lineEndPort})

/* generateLineManageId... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 추가 페이지 > 저장 > 선번장 관리번호 생성 */ SELECT CONCAT(#{lineManageId}, '-', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(line_manage_id, -5) AS UNSIGNED)) + 1, 1), 5, '0')) AS next_id FROM line_basic WHERE line_manage_id LIKE CONCAT(#{lineManageId}, '-%')
mapper.insert: /* saveLineInfo... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 추가 페이지 > 저장 > 선번장 정보 저장 */ insert into line_basic( line_manage_id, start_eqp_id, end_eqp_id, line_speed, line_category, line_color, start_eqp_port, end_eqp_port, installation_year, qr_image_location, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted ) values( #{lineManageId}, #{lineStartId}, #{lineEndId}, #{line_speed}, #{line_category}, #{line_color}, #{lineStartPort}, #{lineEndPort}, #{line_installation_year}, #{qrImageLocation}, NOW(), NULL, 'N' )
mapper.select: /* getLineDetailLinkList... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 수정 / 상세 페이지 > 선번장 정보 (포설년도, 회선정보) */ select lb.line_manage_id, lb.start_eqp_id, lb.end_eqp_id, lb.start_eqp_port, lb.end_eqp_port, lb.installation_year line_installation_year, lctg.category line_category, lspd.speed line_speed, lspd.color line_color from line_basic lb join line_category lctg on lb.line_category = lctg.idx join line_speed lspd on lb.line_speed = lspd.idx where line_manage_id = #{line_manage_id}

/* getLineDetailTotalList... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 수정/상세 페이지 > 선번장 정보 (출발지, 목적지) */ select lb.line_manage_id, /* 선번장 관리번호 */ /* 출발지 */ seb.eqp_manage_id s_eqp_manage_id, /* 관리번호 */ seb.eqp_name s_eqp_name , /* 구성자원명 */ lb.start_eqp_port s_port, /* 포트번호 */ sec.asset_category s_asset_category , /* 출발지 자산 카테고리 */ sed.installation_coordinates s_installation_coordinates, /* 설치좌표 */ seb.model_name s_model_name, /* 모델명 */ seb.host_name s_host_name, /* 호스트명 */ seb.m_company s_m_company, /* 제조사 */ seb.primary_operator s_primary_operator, /* 운영담당자 */ seb.primary_outsourced_operator s_primary_outsourced_operator, /* 위탁운영담당자 */ /* 목적지 */ eeb.eqp_manage_id e_eqp_manage_id, /* 관리번호 */ eeb.eqp_name e_eqp_name , /* 구성자원명 */ lb.end_eqp_port e_port, /* 포트번호 */ eec.asset_category e_asset_category, /* 목적지 자산 카테고리 */ eed.installation_coordinates e_installation_coordinates, /* 설치좌표 */ eeb.model_name e_model_name, /* 모델명 */ eeb.host_name e_host_name, /* 호스트명 */ eeb.m_company e_m_company, /* 제조사 */ eeb.primary_operator e_primary_operator, /* 운영담당자 */ eeb.primary_outsourced_operator e_primary_outsourced_operator /* 위탁운영담당자 */ from line_basic lb /* 선번장 정보 */ join equipment_basic seb /* 출발지 기본정보 */ on lb.start_eqp_id = seb.eqp_manage_id join equipment_detail sed /* 출발지 상세정보 */ on seb.eqp_manage_id = sed.eqp_manage_id join ( select asset_id , asset_category from equipment_categories group by asset_id , asset_category ) sec /* 출발지 연결정보 */ on seb.asset_id = sec.asset_id join equipment_basic eeb /* 목적지 기본정보 */ on lb.end_eqp_id = eeb.eqp_manage_id join equipment_detail eed /* 목적지 상세정보 */ on eeb.eqp_manage_id = eed.eqp_manage_id join ( select asset_id , asset_category from equipment_categories group by asset_id , asset_category ) eec /* 목적지 연결정보 */ on eeb.asset_id = eec.asset_id where line_manage_id = #{line_manage_id}
mapper.update: /* deleteLineList... 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 삭제 선번장관리 > 선번장목록 > 상세 페이지 > 삭제 */ update line_basic set is_deleted = 'Y' where line_manage_id = #{deleteLineTarget}
